turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like you to order me a coffee from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, I'd be happy to. What Starbucks location would you like me to use?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on the corner of Forbes and Craig in Pittsburgh.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what type of coffee woul you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A caffe latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. What size do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are the sizes again?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Short, tall, grande, and venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uh, I'll go with a tall, I guess.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What kind of milk would you like in your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Do you want any sugar or other flavorings in the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the drink hot or over ice?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, so one tall caffe latte with 2% milk from the Starbucks on the corner of Fifth and Craig in Pittsburgh. Is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I'm placing the order for you. It should be ready for pickup shortly. I will bill it to your store account and the receipt will be sent to you via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Anything else I can do for you right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it.
